local_intent: Align to the cloth edge and execute a 0.1 push at 180 degrees to form a fold, then wait and retreat; retry push once if needed.
assumptions: Cloth is detectable or can be found by scanning
Robot can approach the cloth edge safely
Contact sufficient for pushing without explicit contact check
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer phase: visibility fallback, align to cloth_edge, push (0.1 at 180 deg, 1500 ms), then wait and retreat as in the global plan.
